short.ar: احسب الكلمات بسرعة وسهولة. حدد النص واحصل على عدد الكلمات والرموز على الفور.

short.fr: Comptez les mots rapidement et facilement. Surlignez le texte et obtenez instantanément le nombre de mots et de caractères.
short.hi: शब्दों को तेजी से और आसानी से गिनें। पाठ का चयन करें और तुरंत शब्दों और अक्षरों की संख्या प्राप्त करें।

short.ko: 단어를 빠르고 쉽게 계산합니다. 텍스트를 선택하고 즉시 단어 및 문자 수를 얻으세요.
short.nl: Tel woorden snel en eenvoudig. Selecteer de tekst en krijg onmiddellijk het aantal woorden en tekens.
short.pl: Szybko i łatwo zliczaj słowa. Zaznacz tekst i natychmiast uzyskaj liczbę słów i znaków.
short.ru: Быстро и легко считайте слова. Выделите текст и мгновенно получите количество слов и символов.
short.sv: Räkna ord snabbt och enkelt. Markera texten och få omedelbart antalet ord och tecken.
short.tr: Kelime sayısını hızlı ve kolay bir şekilde hesaplayın. Metni seçin ve anında kelime ve karakter sayısını alın.

long.ar,de,es,fr,hi,it,ja,ko,nl,pl,ru,sv,tr:
Simple Word Counter: Quickly Count Words and Characters 

Simple Word Counter is a practical Chrome extension designed to streamline the task of counting words and characters in your selected text. Just by highlighting the text, a popup will immediately show the total word and character count.

Key Features:
• Instant Word and Character Count: Simply highlight any text and a tooltip will promptly display the total count of words and characters.

• Customizable Tooltip: Manage the tooltip's visibility effortlessly with a straightforward on/off toggle.

• Consistent Experience Across Websites: Set the default behavior for new websites using an easy-to-use toggle, ensuring a uniform experience throughout the web.


Getting Started:

1. Download and install the Simple Word Counter extension from the Chrome Web Store.
2. Highlight the text you want to count on any webpage. A tooltip will automatically pop up near the selected text, showing the word and character count.

Additional Settings:
    
• To access more settings, click on the extension icon to open the popup.
• In the popup, you can adjust the tooltip's display and set the default behavior for new websites.
